headline: Northrop Grumman Expands Its Share Repurchase Program by $3 Billion
summary: NOC is set to expand its share repurchase program by $3 billion, bringing the total outstanding authorized amount to approximately $4.2 billion.

headline: Here is What to Know Beyond Why Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT) is a Trending Stock
